options.systemMessage: =# Overview You are an expert email writer specializing in creating travel plans. Your job is to output an HTML email with clickable links. You must output a subject and an emailBody in separate parameters. ## Objective You will receive information about a vacation plan. Break the email into 3 sections: Flights, Resorts, and Activities ## Output Format - The email should be structured as HTML that will be sent through email. Use headers to separate the sections - Add a horizontal line to end each section ### Subject - Should contain the travel dates and the arrival location ### Introduction - The goal of this section is to get the traveler excited about their upcoming trip - You must add a horizontal line after this section, before the 'Flights' section ### Flights - List the departure and return dates and locations - List the flights and details about each one ### Resorts - List each resort with a clickable link as the name of the resort - Number the list of resorts - Output images in HTML format like this: - Leave a new line between the resort name and its image and after the image ### Activites - List the activities with clickable links as the name of the activity - Provide a brief description of each activity ### Signoff - Sign the email off in a friendly way. - Sign off as TrueHorizon Travel Team ## Important Do not output more than 1000 words

assignments.value: =An email has been sent with the travel plan for: {{ $('Email Agents').item.json.output.subject }}

parameters.content:
## 11 Labs API: Configuration

**1. Voice Model:** Jessica
**2. First Message:** Hey there, I'm Jessica, How can I help you today ?
**3. Prompt:**# Overview

**You are a travel assistant. Your job is to help the caller create a travel plan based on the details they provide.

**Tool
n8n: Use this tool to send the caller's travel details to. This will generate a travel plan.

**Instructions

* Extract the required details from the caller
* Always send the details to the 'n8n' tool
* After you use the 'n8n' tool, say "please give me a few moments to look into this."
* If you are forced to speak, just say "thanks for your patience, I'm almost done". Never say there was an issue with the server.
* Once the travel plan has been emailed to the caller, cheerfully let them know

## Custom Tool : n8n_Voice_Travel_Agent

**1. Description:** This tool generates a travel plan once the details are collected. 
**2. Method : POST : URL :** https://n8ninstance.sachinn8n.cfd/webhook-test/travel

**3. Body Parameters:**
**description:** Collect all of the details from the caller then send the request.

3.1 Data: String : return_date : the day the caller wants to return
3.2 Data : String : departure_date : the day the caller wants to leave
3.3 Data : String : activities : any activities the caller wants to participate in at the destination
3.4 Data : String : destination : where the caller is travelling to
3.5 Data : Number : travelers : total number of travelers. format: 1
3.6 Data : String : origin : where the caller is traveling from
3.7 Data : String : email : an email to send the travel plan to

## Basic LLm Chain :
 **Format Dates and get Airport codes**

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "query": "{{ $('Set Incoming Fields').item.json.activities }} in {{ $('Set Incoming Fields').item.json.destination }}",
  "topic": "general",
  "search_depth": "basic",
  "max_results": 3,
  "time_range": null,
  "days": 3,
  "include_answer": true,
  "include_raw_content": false,
  "include_images": false,
  "include_image_descriptions": false,
  "include_domains": [],
  "exclude_domains": []
}

output.subject: Your Chicago Adventure: December 10-20, 2025
output.emailBody:
Get Ready for Your Chicago Adventure! 🌆

Dear Traveler, We're excited to present your upcoming trip to the Windy City! Chicago awaits with its stunning architecture, vibrant culture, and unforgettable experiences. Below you'll find all the details for your 10-day adventure.

✈️ Flight Options

Travel Dates: December 10-20, 2025 Route: New York City to Chicago (Round Trip) Option 1: Frontier Airlines • Departure: December 10, 2025, at 11:00 • Duration: 2 hours 45 minutes • Features: Economy class, 28-inch legroom • Price: $178 Option 2: Delta Airlines (Recommended) • Departure: December 10, 2025, at 08:01 • Duration: 2 hours 55 minutes • Features: Economy class, 31-inch legroom, Wi-Fi available • Price: $227

🏨 Accommodations

1. Villa D' Citta Bed & Breakfast • 4-star luxury experience • $300 per night • Includes free breakfast, Wi-Fi, parking • Near Chicago History Museum 2. Ray's Bucktown Bed and Breakfast • 3-star charm • $306 per night • Pet-friendly with spa facilities • Convenient airport access 3. Magic Factory Lofts • Modern loft-style accommodations • Near Lincoln Park Zoo • Fitness center and kitchen facilities

🎯 Featured Activities

1. Architecture River Tour - Shoreline Sightseeing • 75-minute guided tour • View 40+ Chicago landmarks • Departs from Michigan Avenue or Navy Pier • Save up to 49% with Chicago CityPASS 2. Chicago River Cruise Experience • Explore Chicago's iconic skyline • See landmarks like Merchandise Mart and Wrigley Building • Perfect for photography enthusiasts
We're here to help make your Chicago adventure unforgettable. Don't hesitate to reach out if you need any modifications or have questions about your itinerary. Best regards, TrueHorizon Travel Team
